name: Dialga

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Prevents the opponent from using moves twice in a row.

abilities.name: Screen Protector
abilities.description: Raises the user's Defense stat and lowers the opponent's Attack stat when this Pok√©mon is subject to a priority move or an attack with priority.
